mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board (gno, title,content, writer) values ((SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM information_schema.tables WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'tbl_board'), #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select bno,gno,writer,title,content, regDate, hits,(SELECT TABLE_ROWS FROM information_schema.tables WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'tbl_board') as totalCnt,reseq,depth from tbl_board where bno = #{bno}

select bno,gno,writer,title,content, regDate, hits,(select count(bno) from tbl_board
title like '%' #{keyword} '%'
content like '%' #{keyword} '%'
writer like '%' #{keyword} '%'
) as totalCnt from tbl_board
title like '%' #{keyword} '%'
content like '%' #{keyword} '%'
writer like '%' #{keyword} '%'
order by gno desc, reseq asc Limit #{start}, #{PER_PAGE}
mapper.update: update tbl_board set hits = hits + 1 where bno = #{bno}
update TBL_BOARD set reseq=reseq+1 where gno=#{gno} and reseq >= #{reseq};
